tweet.text: RT @FSIatState: Wesley Frost was the consul in Ireland when the Lusitania sank. After this history-changing event, he faced a whirlwind of…
tweet.html: RT @FSIatState: Wesley Frost was the consul in Ireland when the Lusitania sank. After this history-changing event, he faced a whirlwind of humanitarian & diplomatic challenges to assist stranded American citizens and advise D.C. Learn more about WWI #HeroesofUSDiplomacy: go.usa.gov/xp3FN. pic.twitter.com/STaO11qx7B
